snippet: Officials in two states announced plans Tuesday to equip law enforcement officers with body cameras after police shootings of unarmed men that have created tensions nationally.
abstract: Officials in Los Angeles and Harris County, Tex, in response to uproar over police shootings of unarmed men, say they plan to equip law enforcement officers with body cameras.
lead_paragraph: Officials in two states announced plans Tuesday to equip law enforcement officers with body cameras after police shootings of unarmed men that have created tensions nationally.

headline.main: More Police Officers to Get Body Cameras
headline.print_headline: More Police Officers to Get Body Cameras
